name: SleepBedtimeSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Sleep Bedtime Sounds”
”Alexa, Pause”
”Alexa, Resume”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep bedtime sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Bedtime Sounds is an Alexa skill designed to help you unwind and de-stress whenever you need it. With a wide range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and ambient music, you can find the perfect soundscape to suit your mood. Whether you're trying to meditate, focus, or simply escape from the distractions of daily life.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select this skill.
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.

Sleep Bedtime Sounds earns from qualifying purchases that you make while using this Alexa skill.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
